#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

char W[4000005];
int len, T[4000005];

void kmp_table()
{
	int pos = 2, cnd = 0;

	T[0] = -1; T[1] = 0;

	while (pos <= len) {
		if (W[pos - 1] == W[cnd])
			cnd++, T[pos] = cnd, pos++;
		else if (cnd > 0)
			cnd = T[cnd];
		else
			T[pos] = 0, pos++;
	}

	for (int i = 1; i < len + 1; i++) {
		printf("%d ", T[i]);
	}
	printf("\n");
}

int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
	while (scanf("%s", W)) {
		if (W[0] == 'E') break;
		len = strlen(W);
		kmp_table();
	}
	return 0;
}
